front.title: Interactions between PMIPv6 and DSMIPv6: a scenario while HA and LMA are separate deployment

abstract.t: Home Agent and Local Mobility Anchor are separately deployed is one scene of the interactions between Proxy Mobile IPv6 (PMIPv6) and Dual stack Mobile IPv6 (DSMIPv6). In view of this scenario this document proposes two detailed solutions for a mobile node which is roaming between PMIPv6 and DSMIPv6.
